interface.name: org.umlfri.api.model.ConnectionVisual
interface.documentation: Visual information about connection shown on some diagram.

property.name: diagram
property.documentation: Diagram, on which the connection is located.

property.name: source
property.documentation: Element at source end of the connection.

property.name: destination
property.documentation: Element at destination end of the connection.

property.name: points
property.documentation: All bend points of the connection.

property.name: labels
property.documentation: Positions of all connection labels associated with the connection.
